comments:
Predefined template-Dual Column Chart Listing Report, preview in html and pdf, system throws exception

Steps:
1.Open a new report using the template "Dual Column Chart&Listing" and open the cheat sheet from the topmenu:Help->Cheat Sheets->Dual Column Chart&Listing Report
2.Click the "Click to Perform" arrow to create a datasource "jdbc:jtds:sqlserver://spmdb/gui"
3.Click the "Click to Perform" arrow to create a dataset with table "account"
4.Bind the list with the dataset and generate data binding columns, click "Click to Complete".
5.Click "Click to Perform" to edit the list group: Group on row["account_id"], interval:3
6.Edit the left table: bind the data set to the table
7.Edit the right table: bind the data set to the table
8.Edit the left chart: use inherit data set: X Series->row["account_name"], Y Series->row["account_id"]
9.Edit the right chart: use inherit data set: X Series->row["account_name"], Y Series->row["account_id"]
10.Preview in html
11.preview in pdf

Actual Results:
1.System throws exception
Error happened while running the report

Expected Results:
1.Can be work well

Created an attachment (id=44232)
report design file
Could be data or engine issue?
